start.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/1.jpg[/img]Zoe is 4 years old and loves playing with her teddy bear, Ted.
One starry night, she finds a magical door in the middle of her room.
The door glows and seems to be calling them.
Next to the door, there's a shiny golden key!

forest.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/2.jpg[/img]Zoe holds Ted's hand tightly and walks through the door.
Suddenly, they are in an enchanted forest full of colorful flowers and a sweet smell.
Two paths appear in front of them.

flowers.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/3.jpg[/img]The path of flowers is soft and shiny.
Many blue, red, and yellow butterflies fly everywhere.
Zoe picks up a beautiful glowing flower that never seems to wilt.
A giant butterfly lands in front of them and speaks with a gentle voice.

butterfly_talk.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/4.jpg[/img]The butterfly smiles: 'Hello, Zoe and Ted! I know a secret place full of magic.
Do you want me to take you there?'

help_butterfly.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/6.jpg[/img]The butterfly guides Zoe and Ted among the flowers until they reach a huge tree.
Inside it there is a golden chest.
Zoe opens the chest and finds many magical toys that move on their own and talk to her.
The butterfly also gives Zoe a special charm before saying goodbye.

end_toys.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/9.jpg[/img]Zoe and Ted play until they get tired, laughing a lot with the magical toys.
When the sun begins to set, they return home happily, carrying memories of the enchanted forest.

alone.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/7.jpg[/img]Zoe and Ted decide to continue without help.
They follow a flowered trail until they find a calm lake full of colorful little fish.

lake.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/8.jpg[/img]They sit by the lake, throw little stones in the water, and watch the circles forming.
Ted almost falls into the water and Zoe laughs a lot.
Near the shore, they notice a small locked treasure chest half-buried in the sand.

treasure_chest.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/9.jpg[/img]Zoe uses the magic key to open the treasure chest!
Inside, they find sparkling gems and an ancient map showing secret paths through the enchanted forest.
What an amazing discovery!

secret_path.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/11.jpg[/img]Following the map, Zoe and Ted discover a hidden grove filled with singing trees and dancing flowers.
This secret place is even more magical than anything they've seen before!

end_lake.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/9.jpg[/img]After having fun at the lake, Zoe and Ted find a path back to the magical door.
They return to the room, happy with the adventure.

stones.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/10.jpg[/img]The path of stones shines like stars on the ground.
At the end of the trail, a wooden bridge appears.
It is guarded by a talking frog.

frog.text: The frog says: 'To cross the bridge, you must answer my riddle: What goes up and down but never leaves its place?'

right_answer.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/11.jpg[/img]Zoe answers: 'It is the ladder!' The frog smiles and lets them pass.
On the other side, there is a magical garden full of enchanted toys that dance by themselves.

end_garden.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/9.jpg[/img]Zoe and Ted play in the enchanted garden until they get sleepy.
When they return home, Ted dozes in Zoe's arms, who smiles happily after the adventure.

wrong_answer.text: [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/12.jpg[/img]Ted answers: 'It is the cloud!' The frog laughs: 'That is not it!' Even so, he lets them rest under a nearby tree.

end_rest.text:
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/migueltarga/kiddo/refs/heads/main/stories/images/adventure/12.jpg[/img]Zoe and Ted nap a little under the tree and wake up already in Zoe's room.
The magical door disappeared, but the memory of the adventure stayed in their hearts.
